mapper.select: SELECT a.adminId, a.adminShopName, a.adminWorkXCoordinate, a.adminWorkYCoordinate, a.adminKfBusinessHours, adminWorkPlace FROM wechat_admin_login_mation AS a WHERE adminId IN ( SELECT id FROM wechat_admin_login WHERE adminIdentity = 1 ) AND adminWorkPlace LIKE '%${adminWorkPlace}%'

SELECT a.productType AS typeId, d.typeName, e.optionPath FROM wechat_product AS a, wechat_option AS b, wechat_product_restaurant AS c, wechat_product_type AS d, wechat_option AS e WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT productId FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE productType = 1 AND adminRestaurantId = #{adminId} ) AND a.productState = 2 AND a.productLogo = b.id AND a.id = c.productId AND a.productType = d.id AND c.productState = 1 AND e.id = d.typeLogoId GROUP BY a.productType ORDER BY d.typePriority ASC

SELECT a.id AS productId, a.productName, a.productIntegral, a.productDesc, a.productPrice, a.productType AS productTypeId, a.createTime , b.optionPath AS productLogo, c.productState , c.productNum , c.productNowNum, d.typeName, e.adminShopName, e.adminId FROM wechat_product AS a, wechat_option AS b, wechat_product_restaurant AS c, wechat_product_type AS d, wechat_admin_login_mation AS e WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT productId FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE productType = 1 AND c.adminRestaurantId = #{adminId} ) AND a.productState = 2 AND a.productLogo = b.id AND a.id = c.productId AND a.productType = d.id AND a.productType = #{typeId} AND e.adminId = #{adminId} AND c.productState = 1 AND STRCMP(#{NowTime}, a.startTime) > 0 AND 0 > STRCMP(#{NowTime}, a.endTime) GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.productPriority ASC

SELECT a.id AS productId, a.packageName AS productName, a.packagePrice AS productPrice, a.packageDesc AS productDesc, a.packageIntegral AS productIntegral, a.createTime, b.optionPath AS productLogo, c.productNum , c.productNowNum , e.adminShopName, e.adminId FROM wechat_product_package AS a, wechat_option AS b, wechat_product_restaurant AS c, wechat_admin_login_mation AS e where a.id IN ( SELECT productId FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE productType = 2 AND adminRestaurantId = #{adminId} ) AND a.packageState = 2 AND a.packageLogo = b.id AND a.id = c.productId AND e.adminId = #{adminId} AND c.productState = 1 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

SELECT a.id AS productId, a.packageName AS productName, a.packagePrice AS productPrice, a.packageDesc AS productDesc, a.packageIntegral AS productIntegral, a.createTime , b.optionPath AS productLogo, c.productNum , c.productNowNum, e.adminShopName, e.adminId FROM wechat_product_choose_package AS a, wechat_option AS b, wechat_product_restaurant AS c, wechat_admin_login_mation AS e where a.id IN ( SELECT productId FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE productType = 3 AND adminRestaurantId = #{adminId} ) AND a.packageState = 2 AND a.packageLogo = b.id AND a.id = c.productId AND e.adminId = #{adminId} AND c.productState = 1 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.createTime

SELECT a.id AS productId, a.packageName AS productName, a.packagePrice AS productPrice, a.packageDesc AS productDesc, a.packageIntegral AS productIntegral, a.createTime, b.optionPath AS productLogo, c.productNum , c.productNowNum , e.adminShopName, e.adminId FROM wechat_product_package AS a, wechat_option AS b, wechat_product_restaurant AS c, wechat_admin_login_mation AS e where a.id IN ( SELECT productId FROM wechat_product_restaurant WHERE productType = 2 AND adminRestaurantId = #{adminId} ) AND a.packageState = 2 AND a.packageLogo = b.id AND a.id = c.productId AND e.adminId = #{adminId} AND c.productState = 1 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.packagePrice ASC LIMIT 4

select.if: SELECT a.id AS productID, a.productName, a.productPrice, a.productDesc, a.productIntegral, b.optionPath AS productLogo FROM wechat_product AS a, wechat_option AS b WHERE a.id = #{productId} AND a.productLogo = b.id

SELECT a.id AS productID, a.packageName AS productName, a.packagePrice AS productPrice, a.packageDesc AS productDesc, a.packageIntegral AS productIntegral, b.optionPath AS productLogo FROM wechat_product_package AS a, wechat_option AS b WHERE a.id = #{productId} AND a.packageLogo = b.id

SELECT a.id AS productID, a.packageName AS productName, a.packagePrice AS productPrice, a.packageDesc AS productDesc, a.packageIntegral AS productIntegral, b.optionPath AS productLogo FROM wechat_product_choose_package AS a , wechat_option AS b WHERE a.id = #{productId} AND a.packageLogo = b.id
